roleset.name: vocalize
roleset.note: ENUNCIATE-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from enunciate.01-v)

example.name: enunciate-v: transitive
example.text: It 's your decision '' , said [*T*-1] Juanita , [*-2]holding her face very still , trying [*-3] to contain the bitterness of her voice as she enunciated her words too distinctly .
